titles.title: Come to the Son of Righteousness:

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the Son of Righteousness:
He has healing in His wings;
Come to the Son of Righteousness:
He has healing in His wings.
He has healing in His wings,
He has healing in His wings,
Come to the Son of Righteousness:
He has healing in His wings.
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life,
And the hungry shall be filled;
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life,
And the hungry shall be filled.
And the hungry shall be filled,
And the hungry shall be filled;
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life,
And the hungry shall be filled.
Come to the source, the source of Life,
And of eternal life lay hold;
Come to the source, the source of Life,
And of eternal life lay hold.
Of eternal life lay hold,
Of eternal life lay hold;
Come to the source, the source of Life,
And of eternal life lay hold.
